plugin.name: struts1
plugin.author: Graeme Rocher
plugin.title: Provides integration between Grails and the Struts 1 framework
plugin.description: A plug-in that makes Struts 1 (http://struts.apache.org/) the default controller/view rendering framework for Grails. Struts is an older first generation framework and this plug-in facilitates migration away from Struts to a modern stack like Grails.
